title: Wood Destruction SFX Library
longDescription:
CRRRACKS!!!


Audio preview: https://soundcloud.com/silverplatteraudio/wood-destruction-sound-effects


Introducing "Wood Destruction" - a powerful sound library that brings the raw and intense sounds of wood breaking to your audio projects. This collection is designed to provide sound designers, filmmakers, and video professionals with an extensive range of wood destruction sounds, including the satisfying crunch of splintering wood, the cascade of debris, and the tumbling of falling wood piles.


With an emphasis on capturing the essence of wood breaking, this library offers a diverse selection of recordings that showcase the sheer force and impact of wood destruction. From small wooden objects to massive structures, every breaking sound is meticulously captured to deliver a sense of power and scale. Prepare to immerse your audience in the dramatic and dynamic world of wood destruction.


The sounds in "Wood Destruction" are presented in a clean and isolated format, allowing for seamless integration into your projects without the need for extensive editing. Each sound is carefully labeled and categorized, making it easy to find the perfect wood destruction sound for your specific scene or sequence.


Experience the visceral and captivating sounds of "Wood Destruction" today. Download this powerful sound library and unleash the immense potential of wood breaking in your audio creations. From explosive demolition scenes to suspenseful moments of destruction, let "Wood Destruction" be your ultimate resource for authentic and impactful sound effects.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 166

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 khz / 16 bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Supported Development Platforms:

Mac: Yes

UCS compliant: Yes

Size: 109.3 MB
